title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - REVISED
description:
This RFC aims to gather and document the comprehensive project requirements for AIAssistantDeveloper, a platform for learning how to develop AI-powered coding assistants. The following areas need special attention: 
1. AI capabilities: Define the AI algorithms and models required for natural language processing, machine learning, and decision-making (consider incorporating reinforcement learning for adaptive behavior).
2. User Interface (UI): Detail the design principles and wireframes for an intuitive and engaging user experience, focusing on accessibility and responsiveness across various platforms.
3. API Integration: Identify potential APIs to integrate for seamless third-party service usage, emphasizing on modern tech stacks like GraphQL or RESTful APIs.
4. Testing Strategy: Outline a comprehensive testing approach (consider Behavior-Driven Development [BDD] and test automation frameworks like Selenium or Cypress). This includes unit tests, integration tests, system tests, and end-to-end tests.
5. Security Measures: Specify the necessary security measures (implement multi-factor authentication, secure communication channels, and regular vulnerability assessments).
6. Project Roadmap: Develop a high-level project roadmap that outlines milestones, timelines, and resources required to successfully deliver the platform.
7. Documentation: Create clear and concise documentation for developers, testers, and users, ensuring usability and accessibility.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points for the AI-powered coding assistant platform.

title: Develop AI and NLP Components
description: Develop the AI and natural language processing components responsible for understanding and generating code based on user input.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AI-powered coding assistant platform, including the code editor, input/output interfaces, and user experience.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing user data, code snippets, and AI models.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Implement security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and secure communication between the platform components.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and implement a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the platform.

title: Write Documentation and Tutorials
description: Create comprehensive documentation and tutorials for users and developers, covering the platform's features, usage, and development guidelines.

title: Test and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage
